column2: Nikola Corporation, formerly VectoIQ Acquisition Corp., specializes in battery-electric and hydrogen trucks and powersports vehicles. The Company provides zero-emissions transportation and infrastructure solutions. Its product lineup includes battery-electric and hydrogen-electric class 8 commercial trucks, off-highway vehicles and watercraft. The Companyâ€™s products include Nikola One, Nikola Two, Nikola Tre and Nikola Badger. Its powersports include Nikola NZT, Nikola Reckless and Nikola water adventure vehicle (WAV).
